title: Make Out
lyrics: If I could live forever then I don't know what I'd do Forgot just what I meant to say But I'm still in love with you The future sounds boring Without the one you love So while we're here in here and now Can'tLet's we have make some fun  out Let's make  out Let's make  out Let's make  out I don't even know your name I don't even know your number But I know I need you right now Living in a crazy world You make me kinda crazy girl Tell me if you need me right now If you love somebody You should tell  somebody Do you love  somebody Go and tell somebody T-t-tell somebody
